declare @q nvarchar(4000), @m int select @m = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = 'phlsx' and column_name = 'so_lsx'
update @@table set so_lsx = space(@m - len(rtrim(so_lsx))) + rtrim(so_lsx)
create table #r (ma_vt varchar(32), ten_vt nvarchar(512), dvt nvarchar(32), he_so numeric(19, 4), ma_kho varchar(32), ma_vi_tri varchar(32), ma_lo varchar(32), so_luong numeric(19, 4), ma_vv varchar(32), ma_bp varchar(32), so_lsx varchar(32), ma_sp varchar(32), ma_hd varchar(32), ma_phi varchar(32), ma_ku varchar(32), vi_tri_yn bit, lo_yn bit, nhieu_dvt bit, ref varchar(32), stt int)
select @q = ' insert into #r(ma_vt, ten_vt, dvt, he_so, ma_kho, ma_vi_tri, ma_lo, so_luong, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, vi_tri_yn, lo_yn, nhieu_dvt, ref, stt) select a.ma_vt, b.ten_vt%l, case when isnull(a.dvt, '''') <> '''' then a.dvt else b.dvt end, 1, case when isnull(a.ma_kho, '''') <> '''' then a.ma_kho else b.ma_kho end, case when isnull(a.ma_vi_tri, '''') <> '''' then a.ma_vi_tri else b.ma_vi_tri end, a.ma_lo, a.so_luong, a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku, cast(0 as bit), b.lo_yn, b.nhieu_dvt, '''', a.stt from @@table a left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt left join dmkho c on b.ma_kho = c.ma_kho ' exec sp_executesql @q
update #r set he_so = b.he_so from #r a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1 update #r set vi_tri_yn = 1 from #r a join dmvitri b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho
if not exists(select 1 from #r where dvt <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.dvt = '' or b.dvt is not null or c.dvt is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt if not exists(select 1 from #r where ma_kho <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.ma_kho = '' or b.ma_kho is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmkho b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho and b.ma_dvcs = @ma_dvcs &SiteKey; if not exists(select 1 from #r where ma_vi_tri <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.ma_vi_tri = '' or b.ma_vi_tri is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmvitri b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho and a.ma_vi_tri = b.ma_vi_tri if not exists(select 1 from #r where ma_lo <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.ma_lo = '' or b.ma_lo is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmlo b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ma_lo = b.ma_lo
&CheckImportUserDefinedFields;
select '' as message, 'this.frameElement.result = @@result;parent.set$Grid$ImportResult(this.frameElement);' as script select rtrim(ma_vt) as ma_vt, rtrim(ten_vt) as ten_vt, rtrim(dvt) as dvt, he_so, rtrim(ma_kho) as ma_kho, rtrim(ma_vi_tri) as ma_vi_tri, rtrim(ma_lo) as ma_lo, so_luong, rtrim(ma_vv) as ma_vv, rtrim(ma_bp) as ma_bp, rtrim(so_lsx) as so_lsx, rtrim(ma_sp) as ma_sp, rtrim(ma_hd) as ma_hd, rtrim(ma_phi) as ma_phi, rtrim(ma_ku) as ma_ku, vi_tri_yn, lo_yn, nhieu_dvt, ref, stt from #r order by stt return
